content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing “automation” research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings: not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections; connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with status NO_FUEL and warning “out of fuel”; its fluid box holds water (amount ≈188.96, temperature 15), is now assigned fluid_system [57382], has connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), and a steam output at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) supplying water, status WORKING, linked to fluid_system [57382].
- Manual Fuel Feeding System: Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) designated for fuel storage.
- Pipeline Network:
  • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) carrying fluid_system 57382, status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) carrying fluid_system 57381, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) carrying fluid_system 57394, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) carrying fluid_system 57393, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) carrying fluid_system 57389, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) carrying fluid_system 57398, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) carrying fluid_system 57397, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) carrying fluid_system 57400, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) carrying fluid_system 57401, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) carrying fluid_system 57402, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipeline Connection & Fluid Transfer:
  - Verify that both source and target connection points are unobstructed, within range, and compatible.
  
• Entity Placement & Collision Avoidance:
  - Confirm that the target tile is free of obstructions before placing or repositioning large entities.

• Buildable Area Calculation:
  - Use proper placement attributes to avoid type errors during position determination.

• Pipe Group Identification:
  - Ensure that a pipe group with the required fluid_system is present near the target connection point before attempting attachment.

• General Connection Strategies:
  - Reassess connection methods if initial attempts fail; consider environmental obstacles and inventory constraints.

• Boiler Fuel Supply Management:
  - Monitor and replenish the boiler’s fuel inventory promptly to avoid operational downtime.

• Steam Engine Repositioning Failures:
  - Multiple attempts to reposition the steam engine using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers (56054, 56138, 56220, 56304, 56386, 56470, 56552, 56636, 56718, 56802, 56884, 56968, 57050, 57134, 57216, 57300) within a 5-tile radius of position(-5.5, 19.5) yielded no valid groups.
  - Confirm the availability of appropriate pipe groups within the search area or consider expanding the search radius and verifying fluid_system assignments.
